concept.title: Web Configuration Panel
concept.shortdesc: There are 4 main sections on the Web Configuration Panel for you to check the TA1600/2400/3200’s status and configure it.

ul.li: Status: Check port status, network status, system information, call logs, etc.
System: Configure network settings, security settings, system date and time, password, backup and restore, etc.
Gateway: Configure FXS ports, gateway settings, VoIP settings, etc.

p.note: After saving the changes, click the Apply Changes button on the upper right corner of the Web GUI to make the changes take effect.
